snippet.title: DreamWorks Dragons Dawn Of New Riders Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®4, Xbox One™ and PC on 15th February, 2019 in the US and 1st February, globally. 

A new heroic dragon and rider are taking to the skies and only you can help them defeat the evil villains who destroyed a dragon sanctuary created by Hiccup, Toothless, and his dragon riders.

- A NEW ADVENTURE: Recover Scribbler’s lost memories as you forge a friendship with Patch, his ultimate hybrid dragon 
- BATTLE: Unlock powerful abilities and take on fearsome foes 
- EXPLORE: Fly to new and familiar locations including Havenholme, Valka’s Mountain and Blood Briar Island  
- SOLVE PUZZLES: Swap between Scribbler and his dragon Patch to conquer obstacles

PRE-ORDER NOW: www.outrightgames.com/dragons
